title: icon rito gave me????
body: i just got gifted an icon from rito and the box said "THANK YOU!" and the icon looks like a weird versoin of a scuttle crab. whats this icons origin

replies.body: It looks like you received the Snow Day Scuttler Icon which is being distributed to eligible players from [Snowdown](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016).  This was for gifting a friend during the event!  Let me know if that clears things up!
